Reviews.Content: little hotel stay walking distance clean reasonably priced mom andy williams theater door spent rest ofthe weekend shopping perfect thsi swim eat breakfast ammenities nice staff nice frequent stayers reward card perfect inexpensive

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay at Gazebo Inn”
Reviews.Author: RJ2Missouri
Reviews.Content: booked hotel hotwire 34 pleasantly surprised double queen beds comfy extra pillows cabinet vanity bathroom plenty towels washcloths family air conditioner running arrival extra hot day pool 24 hours sparkling clean water breakfast included waffles donuts cereals juice bagels etc breakfast attendant nice location located hwy outlet mall

Reviews.Title: “OK for a hotel”

Reviews.Content: rarely stay private hotel ok probably wont stay clean quiet updating furniture bathroom facilities learned branson amount money able rent condos available daily weekly rate location gazebo inn wonderful continental breakfast ok

Reviews.Content: friend booked hotel travel package location getting main road branson walking distance didnt mess traffic typical double queen hotel cleanest hotel seen including bathroom staff friendly helpful able book dinner cruise front desk lady running breakfast extremely friendly forgot name hotel middle replacing railings porch pool stairs due tornado damage finished beautiful hotel didnt five rating updating breakfast customers staying hotel fit 12 comfortably sat wraparound porch coffee nice definitely stay

Reviews.Content: stayed gazebo inn celebrating 25th anniversary stayed honeymoon suite thinking morning 630 am hear banging people talking staff getting continental breakfast set told disappointment woke morning told eating aware eating guests noise staff disappointed stay

Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel probably dozen times past branson coming pleased comfortable clean nice quick breakfast friendly staff awesome price round location standard appreciate call shortly satisfactory special touch recommend

Reviews.Title: “Charged $25 to ship my cell-phone charger I left behind”
Reviews.Author: Michelle K
Reviews.Content: fine clean pretty typical hotel breakfast 45 minutes time donuts gone none left replenish stock home realized left cell phone charger plugged bathroom counter lady ship live 4 hours credit card didnt quote price assumed 10 maximum surprised credit card billed 25 inn charged 10 trouble 15 shipping fees box packaging confirmation etc outrageous live learn

Reviews.Title: “Confirmed rate raised at check-in”
Reviews.Author: jmbrug
Reviews.Content: reserved 2 gazebo inns web site arrived checkin couldnt honor rate quoted web claimed june confirmation confirmed rate checkin date november didnt stay start pretty basic 2 queen beds refrigerator updating carpet stains door cleaning shower black mold wall tub cleaning breakfast offered waffles cold cereals yogurt juice coffee motels available branson definately look elsewhere visit

Reviews.Title: “Great location in Branson”

Reviews.Content: spent 4 days branson mo week stayed beautiful hotel called gazebo purchased line upgraded king arrived wonderful beds clean hospitality outstanding wonderful little tea complimentary continental breakfast hospitable staying

Reviews.Content: reserved jacuzzi tub tub replaced cracked shape beds comfortable advertised 3000 free gas 2 nights stay 5000 3 nights stay joke stayed 3 nights reciept gas coupon honor company matter money disappointing
